title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1260.26 - Carrying of firearms and explosives restricted
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1260.26 - Carrying of firearms and explosives restricted

State Regulations

No person except authorized peace officers, post
office, customs, express and air carrier employees or members of the armed
forces of the United States, on official duty, shall carry any firearms and
explosives at an air terminal without permission. All persons other than those
in the excepted classes shall, while at an air terminal, surrender all such
objects in their possession to a Port Authority police
officer. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1260.26

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
